title: List of UK Dance Singles Chart number ones of 2007
text:
The UK Dance Singles Chart is a <a href="music%20chart">music chart</a> compiled in the <a href="United%20Kingdom">United Kingdom</a> by the <a href="Official%20Charts%20Company">Official Charts Company</a> (OCC) from sales of songs in the <a href="dance%20music">dance music</a> genre (<a href="Electronic%20dance%20music">EDM</a>, <a href="house%20music">house</a>, <a href="drum%20and%20bass">drum and bass</a>, <a href="synthpop">synthpop</a>, <a href="dance-pop">dance-pop</a>, etc.) in <a href="record%20store">record store</a>s and <a href="music%20download">digital downloads</a>.
These are the song which reached number one on the UK Dance Singles Chart in 2007.

Specific
